title: Duplicate Cleaner
description: Optimize workflow in Unreal Engine with Duplicate Cleaner. Identify, manage, and save storage space by handling duplicate assets seamlessly
longDescription:
Demonstration Video

Documentation

Discord Channel

Duplicate Cleaner is a game-changing Unreal Engine plugin meticulously crafted to simplify asset management within the Unreal Editor. As game development projects grow in complexity, managing assets efficiently becomes paramount. Duplicate assets not only consume valuable storage but can also introduce confusion into your project hierarchy.

With the Duplicate Cleaner plugin, you gain access to a comprehensive solution for identifying, managing, and streamlining duplicate assets within your Unreal Engine project. Leveraging advanced algorithms and an intuitive interface, this tool empowers developers and designers to optimize their workflow and maintain project integrity.

Supported Classes:

  • UTexture2D
  • UCurveBase
  • UMaterialInstance
  • USoundWave
  • UDataAsset
  • UDataTable
  • UAnimSequenceBase
  • UAnimMontage
  • UStaticMesh
  • USkeletalMesh

Key Features:

  1. Effortless Asset Analysis: Duplicate Cleaner streamlines the process of identifying duplicate assets within your Unreal Engine project. Easily select specific folders or assets for analysis, or perform a comprehensive scan across your project with minimal effort.
  2. Customizable Criteria: Tailor your duplicate search criteria to meet your project's unique requirements. Choose from various matching options, including asset names, sizes, dates, and even content, ensuring precision in duplicate identification.
  3. Preview and Selection: Before taking any action, review the identified duplicate assets through a user-friendly interface. This allows you to make informed decisions on which duplicates to keep and which to remove or redirect.
  4. Safe Removal and Redirection: Duplicate Cleaner places a strong emphasis on the safety of your assets. Remove duplicates securely or redirect them to the original assets, preserving references and preventing potential issues within your project.
  5. Optimize Storage: Eliminate redundant asset copies or intelligently redirect them, freeing up valuable storage space while maintaining project efficiency.
  6. Seamless Integration: This Unreal Engine plugin seamlessly integrates into your Unreal Editor environment, ensuring a hassle-free experience for both novice and experienced users.
  7. Regular Maintenance: Set up automated scans and asset management routines to keep your project organized and efficient over time.

Duplicate Cleaner for Unreal Engine is a must-have tool for game developers, designers, and project managers looking to optimize their workflow and ensure a clean, organized project environment. Say goodbye to wasted storage space and asset management headaches—experience the benefits of Duplicate Cleaner today, exclusively for Unreal Engine users.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Finds duplicated assets by their name
  •  Finds duplicated assets by their class
  • Advanced Delete for duplicated assets that referenced on other components
  • Auto Reference Redirection into one asset

Supported Classes:

  1. Static Mesh
  2. Skeletal Mesh
  3. Anim Sequence
  4. Anim Montage
  5. Texture (Any Kind)
  6. Curve (Any Kind)
  7. Material Instance
  8. Sound Wave
  9. Data Asset
  10. Data Table


Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

 DuplicateCleaner (Editor)

Number of C++ Classes: 16

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, Linux, IOS

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AmnzvsuGYr0dCwEb-XdYJv2x2it4dIXAi3gX6f7a7bs/edit?usp=sharing
